title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
. This will update the journal for: Rescue the Grand Duke. Exit the burning building and a cutscene will the counsellor will soon begin. She thanks you for freeing her and tells you that the Grand Duke Ravengard, has been taken prisoner by the drows. She requests your help to rescue the Grand Duke. Agree to help to continue onwards. If you refuse, it will reflect in your journals.

If you successfully rescue her, you will have the following updates:

Counsellor Florrick, the woman trapped in the
